pullRequest.title: [#10109] Add all responses for student in records page

nodes.bodyText: Let's give a better naming for this.sessions

Maybe you want to write a comment here?
Sessions in the same course will always have the same timezone?

Here you will know whether the student is giver or recipient.
Try to separate them to two groups.
One responseGivenByStudents will goes to here with isGrq=true.
